title: The Lion Guard v1.3.2
description:
ROAR! Inspired by the all-new Disney Junior series, join Kion and the Lion Guard on an action packed adventure to protect the Pride Lands!
*Featuring the fun, new music video "Zuka Zama" from Disney Juniorâ€™s The Lion Guard!*

â€¢ Race Kion through 5 challenging and beautiful locations: the Grasslands, Big Springs, the Canyons, Hakuna Matata Falls, and the Outlands.
â€¢ Call on individual guard members, each with different strengths, to help Kion overcome hazardous obstacles.
â€¢ Collect tokens, unleash Kionâ€™s powerful â€œRoar of the Eldersâ€, and complete lifesaving missions before the sun sets!

FEATURES

â€¢ Race through 25 gorgeous levels in 5 challenging Pride Land locations; 
from the lush Grasslands to the lava-pitted Outlands!
â€¢ Beware mischievous hyenas, mean vultures, hungry crocodiles and more!
â€¢ Fill up Kionâ€™s roar meter to unleash his special â€œRoar of the Eldersâ€.
â€¢ Hurry to complete each lifesaving mission before the sun sets!
â€¢ Conquer dangerous threats along the way by choosing a helpful guard member, each with their own special abilities:
- Bungaâ€™s (honey badger) bravery enables him to fight off snakes, create bridges, and parkour off cliffs.
- Beshteâ€™s (hippopotamus) sheer size enables him to plow through obstacles and give Kion rides across dangerous mud rivers and lakes.
- Onoâ€™s (egret) keen eyesight helps Kion scout out safe paths and his cleverness quickly eliminates multiple villains all at once!
- Fuliâ€™s (cheetah) awesome speed protects Kion from dangerous hazards.

What's New:

Now available in French, Italian, German, Castilian Spanish, Latin American Spanish, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish, Polish, and Brazilian Portuguese.

More Info:
 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=disneydigitalbooks.thelionguard_goo


Instructions:

1.Copy 'disneydigitalbooks.thelionguard_goo' folder to 'sdcard/Android/obb'
2.Install APK
3.Launch the game
